paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the TTR Val30Met variant in the context of hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis, focusing on surgical outcomes and penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: Hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis (ATTRv) with secondary glaucoma

functional_data.summary: The TTR Val30Met variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis, leading to ocular manifestations including secondary glaucoma.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is known to segregate with disease in families affected by ATTRv amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: The study included patients with the TTR Val30Met variant only.
key_quotes: Valine to methionine conversion at amino acid 30 (Val30Met) is the most common and well-studied among more than one hundred TTR variants.

extraction_metadata.notes: The paper primarily discusses the TTR Val30Met variant and its implications in ATTRv amyloidosis.
